title: Shovel Knight (Mac) (Latest With 1.2 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, this patch is important for a few mac users. I notice in my last torrent some of you guys had issiues installing the game. The latest patch now allows the game to work with 10.8.0 MAC OSX or higher. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


-------------


We have uploaded new installers for the PC and Mac version of Shovel Knight. Version 1.2 of Shovel Knight addes French, Italian, German, and Spanish text language support and the mac version has been reworked to work with version 10.8.0 of Mac OS X or higher :) 


--------------
